colla.appl.server

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • colla.appl.server.Server
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    colla.kernel.api.CollAServer, java.lang.Runnable

    public class Server
extends java.util.Observable
implements colla.kernel.api.CollAServer, java.lang.Runnable
    Server is an implementation of CollAServer that uses javaCaLa (http://www.joubertlima.com.br/calapp.html) to work with as many threads as the machine may offers within the Producer/Consumer paradigm. Diogo Matos
